level.heading: Potomac Park - Establishment.
level.text: The entire reclaimed area formerly known as the Potomac Flats, together with the tidal reservoirs, are made and declared a public park, under the name of the Potomac Park, and to be forever held and used as a park for the recreation and pleasure of the people.

level.heading: Section References
level.text: This section is referenced in ยง 10-150.
